title: Which decentralized app could eventually kill Google in the near future? - Quora

response.answer_text: None. Google is a massive company with a massive lead in so many areas. To dethrone Google you’d need to invest a ton into products (search, ads, mail, cloud, etc.) to try to beat them. And you’d need to spend a lot on sales and marketing to even get close. There is no “decentralized app” that will even come close. The people that spread the tall tales about how “decentralized apps are better” don’t really understand applications. Or centralized vs. decentralized. Or how to run a business. They have bought into a crazy idea. 40 years ago these guys would have been telling you that someone invented a car that runs on water but Detroit had them bumped off. Stay clear.
